name: crm-territory-map
description: Sales territory map with Mapbox GL, assignment management, and quota tracking
postMessage: Set your Mapbox token and import: import { TerritoryMap } from './src/modules/crm-territory-map'; <TerritoryMap territories={data} mapboxToken='pk...' reps={reps} onTerritoryClick={t => console.log(t)} />
